archimate:Product.name: env: SANE
archimate:Product.documentation: Secure environment for invited users to analyse closed data using a limited set of tools. Comes in two variants: - Tinker (run/interact with Data Science notebooks or R. User can see the original data, the scripts and the resutls) - Blind (run any script. The user submits the script and receives the results, but never sees the original data)
